title: Paskagankee
description: An isolated village, remote and vulnerable.A series of brutal murders.And a vengeful spirit born of tragedy, reawakened after a centuries-old massacre.Three distinctly different people must come together, racing against time and their own personal demons in a desperate attempt to stop an unstoppable killer and save their town.Welcome to Paskagankee, Maine. You may not survive the visit.
author: Allan Leverone
